summary: This module contains a suite of unit tests that verify the structural and functional correctness of the HoverNet neural network implementation, including checks on encoder parameter freezing, decoder padding behavior, input dimensionality handling, kernel configurations, and successful execution of the model's script-saving utility.
business_intent: To guarantee the reliability and correctness of the HoverNet model used for medical image segmentation, preventing regressions and ensuring that key architectural components behave as expected before deployment in clinical or research pipelines.
